title: Minecraft Cup 2023 Encouragement Award
description: The world created by the team won an award at the Minecraft Cup district tournament held in Japan.

title: Minecraft EDU Challenge Award
description: The Minecraft world I created was selected as the 2nd place in the senior division of the Minecraft Education Challenge organized by the Ministry of Education Malaysia, Sunway Malls, and Microsoft.

title: Programming instructor
description: I am a lecturer at the online programming school "Classmall Kids" operated by YAGO Co., Ltd. We are currently offering classes using the video game "Minecraft".

title: IDEACTIVE JAPAN PROJECT Student Ambassador
description: Microsoft, SoftBank, Meta, VISITS, and IOT Biz Lab are planning a business contest called "IDEACTIVE JAPAN PROJECT," and I am responsible for marketing as a student ambassador. We also organize events such as the "IDEA CREATION WORKSHOP," a hackathon for elementary school students using Minecraft.

title: Team Outstndrs
description: Started with the award-winning of Minecraft Cup, it is a group of digital creators who gathered eccentric students. They are active online in various digital fields such as world creation using Minecraft, videos, 3DCG, urban planning, and so on. Anyone can join the server.

title: Minecraft Cup 2021 Finalists & Winners
description: I competed with a few friends in a Minecraft competition to test our technical skills and critical thinking abilities. We became finalists and won awards. This was a major turning point.
